usefulItems: casserole dish (30 x 25 x 6 cm), bowl, large bowl, oven
title: Chicken and mushroom lasagne

ingredients.content: 100 g Parmesan cheese, crust removed and cut into pieces (3 cm)
100 g cheddar cheese, cut into  pieces (3 cm)
100 g mozzarella cheese, cut into pieces (3 cm)
10 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only
1000 g skinless chicken thigh fillets,  partially frozen and cut into pieces (4-5 cm)
250 g fresh Portobello mushrooms, cut into thin slices (5 mm)
200 g fresh Swiss brown mushrooms, cut into quarters
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper

preparations.content: Grease a casserole dish (30 x 25 x 6 cm) with butter and set aside.
Place Parmesan, cheddar  and mozzarella cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place parsley and thyme leaves into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer into a large bowl and set aside.
Without cleaning mixing bowl, place 500 g of the chicken into mixing bowl and mince <b>10 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer into bowl with herbs.
Place remaining 500 g chicken into mixing bowl and mince <b>10 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer into bowl with chicken and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add oil and wine. Place Varoma into position, then weigh Portobello mushrooms into it. Insert Varoma tray, then weigh Swiss brown mushrooms onto it. Secure Varoma lid and cook <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Transfer Swiss brown mushrooms into Varoma dish, stir to combine and set aside.
Add stock paste, flour, pepper and reserved chicken mixture to mixing bowl and cook <b>5 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>.
Mix with spatula to break up any lumps and cook for a further <b>5 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>.
Add 200g reserved mixed mushrooms, then mix <b>5 sec//speed 3<b>. Transfer mince mixture into a large bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Preheat oven to 180°C. Place milk, cream, butter, salt, pepper and flour into mixing bowl and cook <b>8 min/100°C/speed 3<b>.
Add 150g of the reserved grated cheeses and cook <b>2 min/100°C/speed 3<b>.

hintsAndTricks: Please refer to The Basic Cookbook or Everyday Cookbook for the Chicken stock paste recipe.
